import React,{useState}from'react';import'./styles/CommunityChat.css';// Import the CSS file for styling
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CommunityChat=()=>{const[messages,setMessages]=useState([]);const[newMessage,setNewMessage]=useState('');const handleSendMessage=()=>{if(newMessage.trim()){setMessages([...messages,{text:newMessage,timestamp:new Date()}]);setNewMessage('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"community-chat",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Community Chat"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chat-window",children:messages.map((message,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-message",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"message-text",children:message.text}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"message-timestamp",children:message.timestamp.toLocaleTimeString()})]},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chat-input",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:newMessage,onChange:e=>setNewMessage(e.target.value),placeholder:"Type your message..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleSendMessage,children:"Send"})]})]});};export default CommunityChat;
